typeProperties.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true,
	dateFormats: ['dd/MM/yyyy']) ~> source1
DerivedColumn1 aggregate(groupBy(Serial),
	each(match(type=='double'), concat($$, 'total') = round(sum($$))),
		each(match(name == 'Energy'), concat('', 'Data Value') = round(avg($$))
)) ~> Aggregate1
source1 derive(each(match(name=='Energy'), $$+'val' = toDouble($$)),
		Serial = byName('Serial'),
		each(match(name == 'Test'), $$ = replace($$, $$, 'Test'))) ~> DerivedColumn1
Aggregate1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	mapColumn(
		Serial,
		each(match(name == 'Data Value'))
	)) ~> sink1
